title: Is Kanye West trying to become a pastor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kanye is obviously unpredictable. If he is affiliated with Joel Osteen, my guess is he would not want to pastor an inner city church of 100. It would be go big or go home. But the pastoring business is not easy, even for the big name prosperity preachers we all (justifiably) like to criticize. You have to have a message, great organizational skills, and know how to stay on point, and keep your feet out of your mouth. I don’t see that happening for West in the near future. But one never knows these days. Personally, I wish him well. Paul the Apostle wrote, “whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is preached, and in that I do and will rejoice.”
Truthfully, unbeknownst to him himself, very subconsciously, he wants to be a demon. Really. There are no Christ attributes in him whatsoever. Don’t be fooled by his latest gig and stunt.
